findings.description: LogsFeed shows "Em desenvolvimento" placeholder - no real logs displayed
2 error banner(s) visible on dashboard
findings.details:
Erro na Conex√£oErro ao conectar com a APIVerifique as configura√ß√µes da API
---
Erro ao Carregar DadosErro Portfolio: Failed to fetchErro Balances: Failed to fetchSolu√ß√£o: Verifique as credenciais da Binance Testnet.

findings.description: Debug/development text visible in production UI
Mixed Portuguese/English text on dashboard
Sidebar not collapsed/hidden at tablet viewport (768px)
findings.details: Fixed 256px sidebar reduces content area significantly on tablet

findings.description: Horizontal overflow at mobile viewport (375px) - scrollWidth: 656
Sidebar not collapsed on mobile (202.8125px on 375px viewport)
findings.details: Sidebar takes 54% of the mobile screen

findings.description: ActivePositions.tsx references undefined `ApiService` variable (line 119)
findings.details: ApiService.buildUrl() is called but ApiService is not imported in the component. This will cause a runtime error when trying to close a position.

findings.description: ActivePositions.tsx header contains debug text "HMR ATIVO" (line 229)
findings.details: The h3 heading reads "POSICOES ATIVAS - HMR ATIVO" - development debug text visible to users

findings.description: ActivePositions.tsx uses window.alert() and window.confirm() (lines 99, 139, 148)
findings.details: Native browser dialogs used for close-position confirmation and result feedback instead of proper UI modals

findings.description: Multiple components use `any` TypeScript type
findings.details: BinanceConnectionStatus (line 22: catch err: any), PortfolioOverview (useState<any>, useState<any[]>), DashboardPage (dispatch as any)

findings.description: Excessive console.log statements in production code
findings.details: DashboardPage, BinanceConnectionStatus, PortfolioOverview, ActivePositions all have verbose console.log with emoji prefixes

findings.description: LogsFeed is a static placeholder with zero functionality
findings.details: LogsFeed.tsx only renders a static "Em desenvolvimento" message with no real log data

findings.description: SystemStatus hardcodes service availability (database, redis always "connected")
findings.details: SystemStatus.tsx lines 19-20: database and redis status are hardcoded as "connected" without actual health checks

findings.description: Sidebar uses duplicate icons for different routes
findings.details: Both "Posicoes/Historico" and "Backtesting" use the same icon (line 11-12 of Sidebar.tsx)

findings.description: DashboardPage has 2-second delay before loading data (setTimeout line 39-41)
findings.details: Artificial 2000ms delay in useEffect before fetching dashboard data, degrading perceived performance
